attributes.action: make MP's who have abused their expenses pay back all the money they have made from the tax payer.Only expenses needed to do their jobs should stand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's should have to repay expenses and profits made on property considered not ESENTIAL to doing their jobs. Empty apologies are not enough.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
